channel.title: Adding items to my client, how?
channel.description: [b]Hey, sorry if this is a nooby question, as I am a noob. But I have RuneBash's server client, I changed loginbox, background, names, some text colors, but SkillCapes, Ele', Godly Dragon-hide(Saradomin, Zamorak, Guthix), Hunter & (T), Hunter Hood, Godwords, and Godly Robes(Saradomin, Zamorak, Guthix) - zre all nulled, so I need to add them to my client. If anyone could please give me links to a GZipper, Model editor/creater, whatever you need to add items, and also a small tutorial on how to do it, I would be thrilled, I'll rep++ as well. When and if I release the client, I will give you 15% credits :D 60% to RuneBash, and 25% to me.[/b]

item.title: Adding items to my client, how?
item.dc:creator: @RSC_n33b RSC_n33b
item.description:
@RSC_n33b wrote:

have a look in the client hacking section ,
there are a lot of help full guides there

Read full topic
item.source: Adding items to my client, how?

item.title: Adding items to my client, how?
item.dc:creator: @fighter002 fighter002
item.description:
@fighter002 wrote:

  1. go onto silabs client (to c the items + the ids)
  2. go into ur class8 file
  3. replace the ids in the class8 file to the 1s u found on silabs client
  4. save and compile

hope i helped

P.S. i had alot of trouble with nulls so thats how i no

Read full topic
